purpose: To automate web browser tasks and interactions using a programmable interface
principle: Built on TypeScript, leverages browser automation libraries to interact with web pages programmatically
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with API support for easy integration into other systems, enabling custom automation scripts
limitations: Limited to browser-based tasks; may not support all browser features or complex user interactions
